channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 21:27 Air alert in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow for further messages.
item.description: 游댮 21:27 Air alert in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow for further messages. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 21:20 ATTENTION !!! Threat of use of guided aerial bombs (CABs
